amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report on maintenance of the E-8C Joint Surveillance Target Attack Radar System aircraft fleet.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3940 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3940 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5901; text: CR S5901) To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit to Congress a report on maintenance of the E-8C Joint Surveillance Target Attack Radar System aircraft fleet.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3940 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Perdue to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3940 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
